original_text: So David left his parents to stay with the king of Moab. They stayed with the king all the time that David was hiding near there.
korean_text: 부모를 인도하여 모압 왕 앞에 나아갔더니 그들은 다윗이 요새에 있을 동안에 모압 왕과 함께 있었더라

sentences.original_text: to stay with the king of Moab
all the time that David was hiding
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 숨어 있던 모든 시간 동안
